name: Mardori
description:
Craft your equipment with damage or defense mods.


Create new weapons using blueprints.


Upgrade your ship with various materials from missions.


Game has 5 different main missions and 10 solar systems to unlock. After completing game you unlock Stargate. For Stargate you use coordinate map that drop from bosses that are in main solar systems. Upgrade coordinate maps to get higher risk and reward.

Base equipment has three upgrade slots but highest tiers have five. Be careful with upgrades! There are three types of weapons and ability cores that grant you new ability's through upgrade system.
